The photo was shared on Facebook on June: 2018, with a caption claiming it shows Jawaharlal Nehru trying to kiss a woman.
The photo was also shared on other Faceb: 3. A Google reverse image search revealed that the photo was published on the UK's Metro newspaper website on December 11, 2013, in relation to a play called 'Drawing the Line.'
The play: Drawing the Line' was performed in 2013 and featured actor Silas Carson playing the role of Nehru, debunking the claim that the photo shows the real Nehru.
